title: next step living logo: san serif with round dots over i's, large counters
author: quiddity

comments.content:
Two weights of the same typeface by ParaType:

next step = PT Sans Pro Caption Bold:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/pt-sans-pro/caption-bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140855/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/pt-sans-pro/caption-bold/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/pt-sans-pro/caption-bold/")

living = PT Sans Pro Caption:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/pt-sans-pro/caption/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140855/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/pt-sans-pro/caption/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/pt-sans-pro/caption/")
